metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Elite Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

Marriott Bonvoy Gold Elite status
Enjoy complimentary Gold Elite status and benefits:
25% bonus points on stays
Enhanced room upgrade
2PM late checkout
Marriott Bonvoy Platinum Elite status
Unlock next-level benefits when you spend US$100,000 annually on your card. Benefits include:
50% bonus points on stays
Enhanced room upgrade
4PM late checkout
Choice of welcome gift
Elite Night Credits
For each calendar year, receive 15 Elite Night Credits towards the next level of Marriott Bonvoy Elite status
Know more
Elite Night Credits
For each calendar year, receive 15 Elite Night Credits towards the next level of Marriott Bonvoy Elite status
Elite Night Credits are the number of Qualifying Nights that you will earn when you stay at hotels participating in Marriott Bonvoy. You will earn one Elite Night Credit* (ENC) for each completed Qualifying Night.
Earning Elite Night Credits (ENCs) help you earn Elite Status.

metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Elite Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
Earning Elite Night Credits (ENCs) help you earn Elite Status.
With the 15 ENCs that you may receive from your credit card, you will only need to complete 35 Qualifying Nights to achieve Platinum Elite status, instead of 50 Qualifying Nights.
Free Night Award
Receive 1 Free Night Award valued at 50,000 Marriott Bonvoy points on Card anniversary
Know more
Free Night Award
Receive 1 Free Night Award valued at 50,000 Marriott Bonvoy points on Card anniversary
Receive 1 Free Night Award every year upon payment of your credit card annual fee. The award can be used for one night at participating hotels (redemption level at or under 50,000 Marriott Bonvoy points).
Note:
certain hotels will have resort fees.

Welcome Offer

welcome bonus points:
Earn 75,000 Marriott Bonvoy points upon activation of your card and payment of the joining fees
Earn an additional 75,000 bonus points when you spend US$15,000 on retail purchases in the first three billing statements
Marriott Bonvoy Points Earning
Earn 6 Marriott Bonvoy points per US$1 spent at hotels and resorts participating in Marriott Bonvoy.
1
Earn up to 3 Marriott Bonvoy points per US$1 on international spend.
2
Earn up to 3 Marriott Bonvoy points per US$1 on general domestic spend.
3
3 points per US$1 on general retail shopping (e.g. apparel, dining, etc.)

metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Elite Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
2
Earn up to 3 Marriott Bonvoy points per US$1 on general domestic spend.
3
3 points per US$1 on general retail shopping (e.g. apparel, dining, etc.)
0.75 points per US$1 on grocery and supermarkets, insurance, car dealership related, and quick-service restaurants (i.e., fast-food restaurants)
4
0.30 points per US$1 on real estate, education, petroleum, government services, car-hailing services, food delivery aggregators, and bill payments (including utility and telecommunication)
Express Points Programme
Earn up to 50% more points every month for all your retail purchases on the card (subject to a maximum of 12,000 Express Points per month). You can enroll into the Express Points* programme by paying a monthly fee of AED300. Cardmembers enrolled in the Express Points programme will not be charged the annual fee.
For example, if you earn a total of 8,000 points for your domestic and international spending in a given month, then you earn Express Points as shown below:

metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Elite Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
For example, if you earn a total of 8,000 points for your domestic and international spending in a given month, then you earn Express Points as shown below:
Regular points: 8,000
Express Points: 4,000
Total points earned for the month: 12,000
1. Additional rewards: This is in addition to the points you’ll earn from the loyalty programme. Please
click here
for full terms.
2. International spend is any transaction made internationally in Foreign/non-AED Currency. Spend made on merchants located in European Union and United Kingdom earn 50% of the international spend points.
3. In a given statement cycle, points can be earned for all eligible spend and will be calculated based on category of spend as defined by Mastercard. The Bank or Marriott International are not responsible for merchants categorization.
4. Spend made under the category quick service restaurants (i.e., fast-food restaurants) will earn 3 points per US$1 spent if the value of the transaction is above US$25.

metadata.title: Marriott Bonvoy World Elite Mastercard Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
4. Spend made under the category quick service restaurants (i.e., fast-food restaurants) will earn 3 points per US$1 spent if the value of the transaction is above US$25.
